snippet: The future of Libya depends on mercy or revenge.
abstract: Libya is still in turmoil in the wake of the revolution that ousted Col Muammar el-Qaddafi and has, in practice, no army, no government and no police; in the place of any civil authorities there are militias, manned by revolutionaries, in whose hands the fates of captives and those loyal to Qaddafi's regime rest.
lead_paragraph: The future of Libya depends on mercy or revenge.

headline.main: In Libya, the Captors Have Become the Captive
headline.print_headline: ‘Did You Think About The Six People You Executed?’

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
